NEW NEXO KNIGHT, MONSTERS, QUESTS AND NEXO POWERS!
Meet Axl, the axe wielding giant and fifth NEXO KNIGHT, but watch out for Lavaria, the sneaky chief spy of Jestro’s army. 
Glory awaits in LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS!
